postBootScript:
#!/bin/bash
yum install -y wget;wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/mobius_start_up.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sed -i s'/REPLACE/WORKFLOW/g' /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sed -i s'/readreplace/WORKFLOWread/g' /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sed -i s'/writereplace/WORKFLOWwrite/g' /root/mobius_start_up.sh;sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh;
echo 'SUBNET via IPADDR' >> /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/route-eno1
/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifup-routes eno1
git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/Mobius-scripts.git /root/Mobius-scripts
cp /root/Mobius-scripts/scripts/storage.sh /root/storage.sh
sed -i 's/REPLACE/CIDR/g' /root/storage.sh
sh /root/storage.sh
